## `ExcludeCopyrightNotices` {#batch-excludecopyrightnotices}

Specifies whether to exclude copyright notices.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeCopyrightNotices(Exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
Exclude | `true` to exclude copyright notices.
